name: technician

effect.sun-moon: struggle is unaffected. helping hand and defense curl are not taken into account.
effect.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: struggle is unaffected. helping hand and defense curl are not taken into account.
effect.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: struggle is unaffected. helping hand and defense curl are not taken into account.

short_effect: Strengthens moves of 60 base power or less to 1.5× their power.

flavor_text.sun-moon: Powers up the Pokémon’s weaker moves.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Powers up the Pokémon’s weaker moves.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Powers up the Pokémon’s weaker moves.
